data.title: FingerTec Fingerprint R2
data.meta_description: FingerTec R2 Fingerprint Attendance & Door Access Machine seamlessly integrates biometric technology into your daily security measures. As FingerTec’s bestseller for access control, the FingerTec R2 attendance series ensures practical and secure control. Coupled with the R2c fingerprint slave reader (Out Reader), it delivers fingerprint biometrically controlled entrances and exits, offering comfort and value for money. The FingerTec R2 Fingerprint Attendance & Door Access Machine supports common communication protocols and features an additional USB port for effortless data transfer. With a Linux platform, The FingerTec R2 Fingerprint Attendance Machine provide flexibility and customizable functions. The R2 series includes powerful time attendance software for easy data management and detailed reporting. It accommodates up to 3000 fingerprint templates and stores 120,000 attendance transaction records, ensuring robust security and efficient record-keeping.
data.meta_site_name: Cubyte Soft Sdn Bhd - Discover the power of Fingertec and Timetera attendance systems at Cubyte Soft Sdn Bhd. Streamline workforce management with our comprehensive solutions. Upgrade your system today for accurate and efficient time tracking. Unlock the potential with us
data.text:
FingerTec R2 Fingerprint Attendance & Door Access Machine seamlessly integrates biometric technology into your daily security measures.

As FingerTec’s bestseller for access control, the FingerTec R2 attendance series ensures practical and secure control. Coupled with the R2c fingerprint slave reader (Out Reader), it delivers fingerprint biometrically controlled entrances and exits, offering comfort and value for money.

The FingerTec R2 Fingerprint Attendance & Door Access Machine supports common communication protocols and features an additional USB port for effortless data transfer. With a Linux platform, The FingerTec R2 Fingerprint Attendance Machine provide flexibility and customizable functions.

The R2 series includes powerful time attendance software for easy data management and detailed reporting. It accommodates up to 3000 fingerprint templates and stores 120,000 attendance transaction records, ensuring robust security and efficient record-keeping.
